metadata.synopsis: The adventurer is standing next to the corpses of her comrades she left behind while running for the goblins.

0.speaker: Remira
0.text: I told them to run, the idiots.
0.context: NodeContext: harsh - trying to hold back tears until the player leaves.

1.speaker: Remira
1.text: You better turn north here, or you'll end up like them.

2.speaker: Remira
2.text: Go on. I'm sure you've got better places to be.
2.context: NodeContext: harsh - trying to hold back tears until the player leaves.
